page.title: 12CUBS OF LONG ASHTON
page.content: The Long Ashton 'Lion' Cub pack meets every Thursday in the Scout Hut in Providence Lane. The leader is Mr D. Tuckfield, and his son, Steve, helps. The other leaders are Andy, Linda and Richard. There used to be two Cub packs in Long Ashton, but now they have merged. The Cubs go on a day trip every year and also on Camp for a week. In the summer they go to the nearby Canyon, where they play adventure games over a wide area. Usually there are war games or hunting for sweets. They also cook over fires. The pack's day trips are usually quite a distance from Long Ashton, like to Wembley or Yeovil. The leaders try to make things fun. For example, soon there will be a Dads versus Cubs soccer match, and also Family Rounders. The leaders' hard work is appreciated by most parents
